Employment Type: Full-time
Reports To: CEO / Board of Directors

About the Role


	KloudOpp Limited is seeking a highly experienced, visionary Chief Technology Officer (CTO) to lead the company&rsquo;s technology strategy, architecture, and product development.
	The ideal candidate has 15+ years of professional experience, including senior leadership roles in high-growth or high-revenue technology companies ($5M+ annual revenue).
	This role is responsible for driving technology vision, delivering scalable and secure solutions, and leading engineering and product teams.
	The CTO will ensure KloudOpp&rsquo;s technology aligns with business goals, supports global expansion, and drives competitive advantage.


Key Responsibilities
Technology Strategy &amp; Leadership:


	Define and execute the company&rsquo;s technology vision and roadmap.
	Align technology initiatives with business objectives and market opportunities.
	Advise the executive team on emerging technologies, innovation, and strategic investments.


Product &amp; Engineering Management:


	Lead all engineering, product development, and technical operations.
	Implement best practices in software development, DevOps, and QA.
	Ensure timely delivery of high-quality, scalable, and secure technology solutions.


Architecture &amp; Infrastructure:


	Design and oversee cloud-native, microservices, and modern monolithic architectures.
	Drive adoption of advanced technology stacks (.NET, Java, Python, NodeJS, etc.).
	Ensure robust cybersecurity, data governance, and system resilience.


Innovation &amp; R&amp;D


	Identify and implement emerging technologies to maintain competitive advantage.
	Lead research and development initiatives aligned with business strategy.
	Foster a culture of innovation, continuous learning, and technical excellence.


Team Leadership &amp; Talent Development:


	Build, mentor, and scale engineering, DevOps, and product teams.
	Establish technical standards, coding best practices, and career development programs.
	Lead cross-functional collaboration with product, design, and business teams.


Global &amp; Strategic Collaboration:


	Collaborate with investors, partners, and stakeholders on technical due diligence.
	Provide technical leadership during strategic partnerships, fundraising, and product launches.
	Represent KloudOpp at tech conferences, summits, and thought leadership platforms.


Required Experience &amp; Skills


	15+ years of professional experience, including senior technology leadership roles (CTO, VP Engineering, Head of Technology).
	Experience in companies generating $5M+ annual revenue or fast-growing scale-ups.
	Deep expertise in cloud-native systems, microservices, SaaS, security, DevOps, and advanced software architecture.
	Hands-on experience with .NET, .NET Core, Java, Python, NodeJS, or equivalent tech stacks.
	Proven ability to lead large engineering teams and deliver complex technical projects.
	Strong strategic thinking, problem-solving, and communication skills.
	Must pass rigorous background and reference checks.


Preferred Qualifications:


	Advanced Degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field.
	Experience in FinTech, HealthTech, EdTech, Logistics Tech, or enterprise technology.
	Familiarity with AI/ML, blockchain, or emerging tech applications.
	Experience with remote or globally distributed teams.
	Proven track record of successful product launches, scaling systems, and technology innovation.


Why Join KloudOpp Limited?


	Salary: N2,000,000 - N2,500,000 / Month.
	Lead technology strategy for a fast-growing, globally scaling tech company
	Fully remote work environment with global team collaboration
	Influence product innovation, system architecture, and engineering excellence
	Opportunity to drive technical vision, global expansion, and industry impact
	Career path to Board Membership and global technology leadership recognition

Chief Technology Officer Job at KloudOpp Limited




        
    

        
        KloudOpp Limited is a new early-stage educational technology (EdTech) and Service Provider startup based on an ambitious & exciting, yet realistic product vision.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Chief Technology Officer
Job Location: Completely Remote / Nigeria Preferred
Employment Type: Full-time
Reports To: CEO / Board of Directors

About the Role
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	KloudOpp Limited is seeking a highly experienced, visionary Chief Technology Officer (CTO) to lead the company’s technology strategy, architecture, and product development.
	The ideal candidate has 15+ years of professional experience, including senior leadership roles in high-growth or high-revenue technology companies ($5M+ annual revenue).
	This role is responsible for driving technology vision, delivering scalable and secure solutions, and leading engineering and product teams.
	The CTO will ensure KloudOpp’s technology aligns with business goals, supports global expansion, and drives competitive advantage.


Key Responsibilities
Technology Strategy & Leadership:


	Define and execute the company’s technology vision and roadmap.
	Align technology initiatives with business objectives and market opportunities.
	Advise the executive team on emerging technologies, innovation, and strategic investments.


Product & Engineering Management:


	Lead all engineering, product development, and technical operations.
	Implement best practices in software development, DevOps, and QA.
	Ensure timely delivery of high-quality, scalable, and secure technology solutions.


Architecture & Infrastructure:


	Design and oversee cloud-native, microservices, and modern monolithic architectures.
	Drive adoption of advanced technology stacks (.NET, Java, Python, NodeJS, etc.).
	Ensure robust cybersecurity, data governance, and system resilience.


Innovation & R&D


	Identify and implement emerging technologies to maintain competitive advantage.
	Lead research and development initiatives aligned with business strategy.
	Foster a culture of innovation, continuous learning, and technical excellence.


Team Leadership & Talent Development:


	Build, mentor, and scale engineering, DevOps, and product teams.
	Establish technical standards, coding best practices, and career development programs.
	Lead cross-functional collaboration with product, design, and business teams.


Global & Strategic Collaboration:


	Collaborate with investors, partners, and stakeholders on technical due diligence.
	Provide technical leadership during strategic partnerships, fundraising, and product launches.
	Represent KloudOpp at tech conferences, summits, and thought leadership platforms.


Required Experience & Skills


	15+ years of professional experience, including senior technology leadership roles (CTO, VP Engineering, Head of Technology).
	Experience in companies generating $5M+ annual revenue or fast-growing scale-ups.
	Deep expertise in cloud-native systems, microservices, SaaS, security, DevOps, and advanced software architecture.
	Hands-on experience with .NET, .NET Core, Java, Python, NodeJS, or equivalent tech stacks.
	Proven ability to lead large engineering teams and deliver complex technical projects.
	Strong strategic thinking, problem-solving, and communication skills.
	Must pass rigorous background and reference checks.


Preferred Qualifications:


	Advanced Degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field.
	Experience in FinTech, HealthTech, EdTech, Logistics Tech, or enterprise technology.
	Familiarity with AI/ML, blockchain, or emerging tech applications.
	Experience with remote or globally distributed teams.
	Proven track record of successful product launches, scaling systems, and technology innovation.


Why Join KloudOpp Limited?


	Salary: N2,000,000 - N2,500,000 / Month.
	Lead technology strategy for a fast-growing, globally scaling tech company
	Fully remote work environment with global team collaboration
	Influence product innovation, system architecture, and engineering excellence
	Opportunity to drive technical vision, global expansion, and industry impact
	Career path to Board Membership and global technology leadership recognition


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV / Resume detailing database development and administration experience; Cover Letter highlighting advanced database architecture and leadership; GitHub or portfolio link demonstrating database design, scripts, or projects; 3-minute video summary explaining technical database experience and impact; and List of relevant certifications to: careers@kloudopp.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note: Failure to meet any of these equals automatic disqualification.

        Trade Lenda is a digital bank for Small and Medium Scale Enterprises (SMEs), empowering them through strategic financing to sustain business growth and contribute towards economic prosperity.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Full Stack Developer

Job Location: Maryland, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time (Hybrid)

Job Description

	As a Backend Developer, you must be proficient in GoLand and JavaScript, and will equally play a key role in designing and maintaining the backbone of our systems and applications for our top brands (Trade Lenda, One Kiosk, and its subsidiaries) as Africa's No.1, and supporting the CTO in providing technical guidance to the development team.You will report directly to the CTO, Chief Technical Officer/Head of the Tech Unit.


Your schedule of duties shall include, but not be limited to, the following:


	Mentor and coach junior developers, fostering a collaborative and knowledge-sharing environment.
	Stay abreast of industry trends, emerging technologies, and best practices to drive continuous improvement.
	Contribute to the architectural design of software systems, ensuring scalability, reliability, and maintainability.
	Evaluate and recommend appropriate technologies and frameworks to meet project requirements.
	Conduct regular code reviews to ensure code quality, adherence to coding standards, and the implementation of best practices.
	Collaborate with quality assurance teams to develop and execute comprehensive test plans.
	Collaborate with product managers, UX/UI designers, and other stakeholders to understand project requirements and deliver optimal solutions.
	Communicate effectively with team members and project stakeholders, providing regular updates on project progress.
	Investigate and resolve complex technical issues, providing timely support to maintain system integrity.
	Participate in on-call rotations for critical production issues.
	Writing reports & Conducting development tests.
	Conceiving and implementing concepts, guidelines, and strategies in various creative projects
	Periodically reviewing and advising the Tech Line Management on customer insights, market, and industry trends.
	Mentoring, coaching, and providing staff leadership as well as inspiration to drive change and build team spirit.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess a Bachelor’s Degree in with 2 - 3 years of experience. 


Salary
N250,000 - N300,000 Monthly.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should forward their Resume to: careers@tradelenda.com using "Fullstack Developer" as the subject of the email.

  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Chief Revenue Officer (CRO)",
  "description": "KloudOpp Limited is a new early-stage educational technology (EdTech) and Service Provider startup based on an ambitious &amp; exciting, yet realistic product vision.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Chief Revenue Officer (CRO)

Job Location:&nbsp;Completely Remote / Nigeria Preferred
Employment Type: Full-time
Reports To: CEO / Board of Directors

About the Role


	KloudOpp Limited is seeking a highly strategic, revenue- and growth-driven Chief Revenue Officer (CRO) with extensive experience in driving top-line growth, scaling revenue operations, and leading go-to-market strategies.
	The ideal candidate has 15+ years of experience, preferably with senior leadership experience in high-revenue companies or startups generating $5 million+ annually, with a proven track record of building revenue pipelines, scaling teams, and securing high-value partnerships.
	This role is responsible for defining and executing revenue strategy, overseeing sales, marketing, business development, and partnerships, while ensuring sustainable growth and operational excellence.


Key Responsibilities
Revenue Strategy &amp; Growth:


	Develop and execute comprehensive revenue strategies aligned with company goals.
	Drive growth across multiple revenue streams, including B2B, B2C, enterprise, and partnerships.
	Establish metrics, KPIs, and reporting frameworks to measure and optimize revenue performance.


Sales &amp; Business Development Leadership:


	Lead, mentor, and scale sales, business development, and partnership teams.
	Identify and secure high-value clients, strategic accounts, and global partnerships.
	Develop sales processes, compensation models, and incentive structures to maximize performance.


Marketing &amp; Go-to-Market:


	Collaborate with marketing to develop demand generation, lead nurturing, and market penetration strategies.
	Oversee pricing, product positioning, and market expansion initiatives.
	Utilize data-driven insights to optimize sales funnels and campaign ROI.


Partnerships &amp; Strategic Alliances:


	Identify and manage strategic partnerships, joint ventures, and high-value collaborations.
	Leverage network to create new revenue opportunities and expansion avenues.
	Act as primary executive representative in high-level negotiations.


Operational &amp; Cross-Functional Leadership:


	Collaborate with finance, product, and operations teams to ensure alignment with revenue goals.
	Implement scalable processes and tools to improve operational efficiency and performance.
	Drive a culture of accountability, performance, and data-driven decision-making.


Required Experience &amp; Skills


	15+ years of professional experience, including senior leadership roles (VP of Sales, Head of Revenue, CRO).
	Experience in high-revenue companies ($5M+ annual revenue) or fast-scaling startups.
	Proven track record of scaling revenue operations, securing enterprise deals, and driving measurable growth.
	Deep experience in FinTech, HealthTech, EdTech, Logistics Tech, or technology-driven sectors.
	Strong skills in strategic planning, forecasting, pipeline management, and executive leadership.
	Demonstrated ability to build high-performing teams, partnerships, and revenue channels.
	Must pass rigorous background and reference checks.


Preferred Qualifications:


	MBA, Executive Education, or certifications in Sales Leadership, Revenue Operations, or Strategic Management.
	Experience with global or remote teams and international market expansion.
	Familiarity with CRM tools, analytics platforms, and modern revenue technologies.
	Demonstrated ability to negotiate and close high-value deals.


Why Join KloudOpp Limited?


	Salary: N2,000,000 - N2,500,000 monthly.
	Lead revenue strategy for a fast-growing, globally scaling tech company
	Fully remote work environment with global collaboration
	Influence market penetration, sales operations, and strategic partnerships
	Opportunity to drive top-line growth, investor confidence, and global expansion.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their applications to:&nbsp;careers@kloudopp.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Mandatory Application Requirements (Any missing item = automatic disqualification)
Applicants must submit ALL of the following:


	CV / Resume detailing revenue leadership and growth achievements
	Cover Letter highlighting verifiable results in revenue generation, partnerships, and business scaling
	Portfolio or proof of revenue growth achievements (e.g., client acquisitions, partnerships, revenue scaling metrics)
	3-minute video summary explaining leadership philosophy, growth strategy, and revenue impact.

Chief Revenue Officer (CRO) Job at KloudOpp Limited




        
    

        
        KloudOpp Limited is a new early-stage educational technology (EdTech) and Service Provider startup based on an ambitious & exciting, yet realistic product vision.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Chief Revenue Officer (CRO)

Job Location: Completely Remote / Nigeria Preferred
Employment Type: Full-time
Reports To: CEO / Board of Directors

About the Role
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	KloudOpp Limited is seeking a highly strategic, revenue- and growth-driven Chief Revenue Officer (CRO) with extensive experience in driving top-line growth, scaling revenue operations, and leading go-to-market strategies.
	The ideal candidate has 15+ years of experience, preferably with senior leadership experience in high-revenue companies or startups generating $5 million+ annually, with a proven track record of building revenue pipelines, scaling teams, and securing high-value partnerships.
	This role is responsible for defining and executing revenue strategy, overseeing sales, marketing, business development, and partnerships, while ensuring sustainable growth and operational excellence.


Key Responsibilities
Revenue Strategy & Growth:


	Develop and execute comprehensive revenue strategies aligned with company goals.
	Drive growth across multiple revenue streams, including B2B, B2C, enterprise, and partnerships.
	Establish metrics, KPIs, and reporting frameworks to measure and optimize revenue performance.


Sales & Business Development Leadership:


	Lead, mentor, and scale sales, business development, and partnership teams.
	Identify and secure high-value clients, strategic accounts, and global partnerships.
	Develop sales processes, compensation models, and incentive structures to maximize performance.


Marketing & Go-to-Market:


	Collaborate with marketing to develop demand generation, lead nurturing, and market penetration strategies.
	Oversee pricing, product positioning, and market expansion initiatives.
	Utilize data-driven insights to optimize sales funnels and campaign ROI.


Partnerships & Strategic Alliances:


	Identify and manage strategic partnerships, joint ventures, and high-value collaborations.
	Leverage network to create new revenue opportunities and expansion avenues.
	Act as primary executive representative in high-level negotiations.


Operational & Cross-Functional Leadership:


	Collaborate with finance, product, and operations teams to ensure alignment with revenue goals.
	Implement scalable processes and tools to improve operational efficiency and performance.
	Drive a culture of accountability, performance, and data-driven decision-making.


Required Experience & Skills


	15+ years of professional experience, including senior leadership roles (VP of Sales, Head of Revenue, CRO).
	Experience in high-revenue companies ($5M+ annual revenue) or fast-scaling startups.
	Proven track record of scaling revenue operations, securing enterprise deals, and driving measurable growth.
	Deep experience in FinTech, HealthTech, EdTech, Logistics Tech, or technology-driven sectors.
	Strong skills in strategic planning, forecasting, pipeline management, and executive leadership.
	Demonstrated ability to build high-performing teams, partnerships, and revenue channels.
	Must pass rigorous background and reference checks.


Preferred Qualifications:


	MBA, Executive Education, or certifications in Sales Leadership, Revenue Operations, or Strategic Management.
	Experience with global or remote teams and international market expansion.
	Familiarity with CRM tools, analytics platforms, and modern revenue technologies.
	Demonstrated ability to negotiate and close high-value deals.


Why Join KloudOpp Limited?


	Salary: N2,000,000 - N2,500,000 monthly.
	Lead revenue strategy for a fast-growing, globally scaling tech company
	Fully remote work environment with global collaboration
	Influence market penetration, sales operations, and strategic partnerships
	Opportunity to drive top-line growth, investor confidence, and global expansion.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their applications to: careers@kloudopp.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Mandatory Application Requirements (Any missing item = automatic disqualification)
Applicants must submit ALL of the following:


	CV / Resume detailing revenue leadership and growth achievements
	Cover Letter highlighting verifiable results in revenue generation, partnerships, and business scaling
	Portfolio or proof of revenue growth achievements (e.g., client acquisitions, partnerships, revenue scaling metrics)
	3-minute video summary explaining leadership philosophy, growth strategy, and revenue impact.
